alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 6:43PM CST until January 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Patchy light freezing drizzle will transition to snow this evening. Snow will continue tonight into Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami and South Beltrami Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions may develop through Saturday. The conditions may impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; South Beltrami
